author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Axis Bar and Lounge Presents Mandarin Oriental, Singapore TeaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Axis Bar and Lounge Presents Mandarin Oriental, Singapore Tea
Experience true oriental charm as Axis Bar and Lounge presents the spirit and sense of the legendary Mandarin Oriental heritage in the exclusive Mandarin Oriental, Singapore Haute Couture Tea.
Inspired by the rich multi-cultural heritage of Singaporeâ€™s history and developed in conjunction with TWG Tea, the exclusive Mandarin Oriental, Singapore Tea is a unique green tea blend featuring strong Asian flavours, presented with a contemporary imaginative allure. The spectacular mix of citrus-infused fragrances complements the spicy and minty notes, evoking an exceptional complex and aromatic aftertaste.
In addition to the premium selection of TWG Teas already available at Axis Bar and Lounge, guests who enjoy the extravagant Afternoon Tea experience at Axis Bar and Lounge may also have the opportunity of relishing in a cup of Mandarin Oriental, Singapore Tea, an exclusive tea blend as the perfect accompaniment for sweet and savoury treats.
An ideal gift and souvenir, guests may purchase an elegantly packed 100 grams of Mandarin Oriental, Singapore Haute Couture Tea at SGD 48 nett.
Source:- Mandarin Oriental
